languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, ваши ресурсы и статус позволят вам обойтись самым банальным и доступным инструментом из всех, какие можно применить в этой ситуации. Наймиты. Псы войны, готовые за монету отправиться хоть в сам варп. Обеспечьте надзирателей подобной подмогой — и кризис будет преодолен".

"Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war will storm the warp itself for the right price. Provide the overseers with some hired backup, and you can consider the crisis resolved."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, ваши ресурсы и статус позволят вам обойтись самым банальным и доступным инструментом из всех, какие можно применить в этой ситуации. Наймиты. Псы войны, готовые за монету отправиться хоть в сам варп. Обеспечьте надзирателей подобной подмогой — и кризис будет преодолен".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to use the most banal and affordable tool of all that can be used in this situation — to hire the mercenaries. The War Dogs who would be ready and willing to go even inside the Warp if you pay them well. Provide the wardens with the support like this, and the crisis shall be overcome."

"Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to use the most banal and affordable tool of all that can be used in this situation — to hire the mercenaries. The War Dogs who would be ready and willing to go even inside the Warp if you pay them well. Provide the wardens with the support like this, and the crisis shall be overcome."

"Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war will storm the warp itself for the right price. Provide the overseers with some hired backup, and you can consider the crisis resolved."

"Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war would even be ready and willing to go inside the warp if you paid them well enough. Provide the wardens with some backup from their ranks, and the crisis will be over in mere moments."

"Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war would even be ready and willing to go inside the warp if you paid them well enough. Provide the overseers with some backup from their ranks, and the crisis will be over in mere moments."

"Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war will storm the warp itself for the right price. Provide the overseers with some hired backup, and you can consider the crisis resolved."

"Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war will storm the warp itself for the right price. Provide the overseers with some hired backup, and you can consider the crisis resolved."

"Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war will storm the warp itself for the right price. Provide the overseers with some hired backup, and you can consider the crisis resolved."

languages.text: “舰长大人，您身居高位，拥有足够的资源，可以使用最笨拙、最便宜的工具——雇佣兵。只要能谈好价钱，这群战争贩子甚至连亚空间都愿意闯。让他们为监察员提供支援，这场危机肯定很快就能解决。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war will storm the warp itself for the right price. Provide the overseers with some hired backup, and you can consider the crisis resolved."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，您身居高位，拥有足够的资源，可以使用最笨拙、最便宜的工具——雇佣兵。只要能谈好价钱，这群战争贩子甚至连亚空间都愿意闯。让他们为监察员提供支援，这场危机肯定很快就能解决。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, sus recursos y estatus le permiten emplear una de las herramientas más asequibles y directas que hay: mercenarios. Estos perros de guerra invadirían la mismísima disformidad si el precio fuera lo suficientemente elevado. Contrate refuerzos para los supervisores y podrá dar por resuelta la crisis».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war will storm the warp itself for the right price. Provide the overseers with some hired backup, and you can consider the crisis resolved."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, sus recursos y estatus le permiten emplear una de las herramientas más asequibles y directas que hay: mercenarios. Estos perros de guerra invadirían la mismísima disformidad si el precio fuera lo suficientemente elevado. Contrate refuerzos para los supervisores y podrá dar por resuelta la crisis».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、あなたのように資源と地位があれば...傭兵という最も率直で手頃な価格のツールを利用することができますね。これらの戦争犬たちは、十分な報酬を払えば、歪みの中に入る準備もできているし、喜んで入ってくれるでしょう。看守たちを援助すれば、危機はすぐに収まると思います」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war will storm the warp itself for the right price. Provide the overseers with some hired backup, and you can consider the crisis resolved."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、あなたのように資源と地位があれば...傭兵という最も率直で手頃な価格のツールを利用することができますね。これらの戦争犬たちは、十分な報酬を払えば、<歪み>の中に入る準備もできているし、喜んで入ってくれるでしょう。看守たちを援助すれば、危機はすぐに収まると思います」

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}-capitaine, votre statut et vos ressources vous permettent d'avoir recours au moyen le plus brutal et le plus économique qui soit : des mercenaires. Ce sont des types prêts à tout, même à prendre le Warp d'assaut si vous les payez suffisamment. Engagez-en pour renforcer les contremaîtres, et cette crise ne sera bientôt plus qu'un mauvais souvenir. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war will storm the warp itself for the right price. Provide the overseers with some hired backup, and you can consider the crisis resolved."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}-capitaine, votre statut et vos ressources vous permettent d'avoir recours au moyen le plus brutal et le plus économique qui soit : des mercenaires. Ce sont des types prêts à tout, même à prendre le Warp d'assaut si vous les payez suffisamment. Engagez-en pour renforcer les contremaîtres, et cette crise ne sera bientôt plus qu'un mauvais souvenir. »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, Eure Ressourcen und Euer Status gestatten es Euch, eines der stumpfesten und günstigsten Werkzeuge überhaupt zu wählen ... Söldner. Für den richtigen Preis stürmen diese Hunde des Krieges den Warp selbst. Besorgt den Aufsehern Verstärkung und Ihr könnt die Krise als beendet betrachten."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war will storm the warp itself for the right price. Provide the overseers with some hired backup, and you can consider the crisis resolved."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, Eure Ressourcen und Euer Status gestatten es Euch, eines der stumpfesten und günstigsten Werkzeuge überhaupt zu wählen ... Söldner. Für den richtigen Preis stürmen diese Hunde des Krieges den Warp selbst. Besorgt den Aufsehern Verstärkung und Ihr könnt die Krise als beendet betrachten."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, kaynaklarınız ve statünüz gereği en gabi ve ucuz araçlardan birine erişiminiz bulunuyor: Paralı askerlere. Bu harp köpeklerinin cebine güzelce para akıtabilirseniz öteboyutu bile darmadağın edeceklerdir. Gözetmenlere destek olmalarını sağlayabilirseniz bu krizi çözülmüş bilebilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, your resources and status allow you to make use of one of the most blunt and affordable tools of all — mercenaries. These dogs of war will storm the warp itself for the right price. Provide the overseers with some hired backup, and you can consider the crisis resolved."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, kaynaklarınız ve statünüz gereği en gabi ve ucuz araçlardan birine erişiminiz bulunuyor: Paralı askerlere.
